fixes.name: dep calc 1
fixes.solution_explanation: Row-level passthrough of [DeptID] to a calculated column. Column reference converted to 'HR Dataset'[DeptID].

fixes.name: dep calc 2
fixes.solution_explanation: Row-level multiplication of dep calc 1 and MarriedID. References converted to 'HR Dataset'[dep calc 1] and 'HR Dataset'[MarriedID].

fixes.name: dep calc 3
fixes.solution_explanation: Aggregation SUM over the column dep calc 2 converted to a DAX measure using SUM('HR Dataset'[dep calc 2]).
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation (SUM), so it should be created as a measure.
